title: Adele 'introduces new boyfriend Skepta to James Corden and friends'
text:
Adele has reportedly been introducing new boyfriend Skepta to all her pals

Adele is reportedly dating Grime star Skepta and has been introducing him to all her pals.

She and the rapper have been enjoying a bit of a fling, now Adele is a single lady again following her marriage split from ex Simon Konecki.

According to The Sun, Adele is already stepping things up a notch when it comes to her romance with Skepta and has ‘introduced’ him to her friends, including her best pal Laura and James Corden.

Laura is Adele’s closest friend from the Brit School and she’s struck up a good friendship with The Late Late Show host James, after moving to LA.

A source told the paper: ‘The fact Skepta has met Laura and James seems like a positive sign. Everyone wants the best for both [him and Adele].

Sources claim Adele introduced Skepta to her close friend James Corden (Picture: CBS)

‘These are two people who care about each other very much as friends so it’s very exciting times.’

The source added that ‘nobody had seen the relationship coming’, but seemed to cast doubt over whether it will go the distance – describing Adele and Skepta’s romance as a ‘brief fling’.

Only time will tell, right?

News of Adele and Skepta dating first surfaced at the beginning of October, with it being claimed the pair, who both hail from Tottenham, share a ‘special connection’.

It seems like Adele is moving on from her marriage ending, after filing for divorcing. She confirmed her split from ex Simon five months ago and the pair are sharing custody of their six-year-old son Angelo.

Adele and Simon began dating in 2011 and welcomed Angelo a year later in 2012.

They tied the knot in secret in 2016, with Adele publicly addressing the wedding for the first time during an acceptance speech at the 2017 Grammys.
